service_name: Bicycle abandoned on the street or sidewalk
description: Did you find an abandoned bicycle in a public space? Please let us know.
keywords: Abandoned bicycle, bike

description: You can file a report if a vehicle is parked at an address for more than three days without moving.
keywords: Abandoned Vehicle, Parking Enforcement, Ilegally Parked

description: Are planes flying over your community too loud? You can file a report.
keywords: Aircraft, plane, Aircraft noise disturbance

description: You found a pet and have it in your care.
keywords: Animal Control, Lost, Found, Pet, Pets, Dog, Cat, Bird, lizard

description: Get help from Animal Control that doesn't involve a lost or found pet.
keywords: animal, barking, noise, injured, wild animal, pet, pets, animal control, general request, leash law, stray, puppy, General animal help

description: You lost your pet and want to let Animal Control know.
keywords: Animal Control, Lost, Found, Pet, Pets, Dog, Cat, Bird,Lost animal

description: Bed bugs in an apartment. Note: for other types of insects, please use "Unsatisfactory Living Conditions"
keywords: Bed Bugs, Housing, Bed bugs in apartment

description: Make a request for bike racks, bike lanes, or general bike infrastructure in Boston.
keywords: BICYCLEISS, bike issues, bicycle request,General bicycle request

description: Report a bird infestation in a public place. You should see a lot of bird droppings in the area.
keywords: Environment, Bird infestation,Pigeon infestation; Pigeon droppings

description: File a report if housing conditions may be triggering your child's asthma.
keywords: Breathe easy, Housing

service_name: Bridge, guard rail, or public stairs need maintenance
description: You are reporting the need to repair a bridge, guard rail, or stairs as part of a public property.
keywords: Bridge; Guard Rail; Stair

description: Schedule an inspection for a permitted construction process. This includes rough, final, partial, footing, and other required general site visits.
keywords: Building,General Building Complaint,Building Permit Inspection Request

service_name: Boston Water and Sewer billing issue
description: File a complaint about a Boston Water and Sewer bill.
keywords: BWSC, Billing, Complaint, Boston Water and Sewer issue

service_name: Boston Water and Sewer general request
description: Get help with your water system from Boston Water and Sewer.
keywords: Boston water, Sewer general request

service_name: Storm drain is clogged or broken
description: You want to clean or repair a catch basin. Catch basins are the storm drains or grates you see on the street.
keywords: BWSC, Catchbasin, Gutter, Sewer, Drainage, Flooding, Boston Water and Sewer

description: File a request to pick up trash or clean up a City cemetery.
keywords: cemetery, Cemetery Maintenance

service_name: Auto body shop doing illegal work
description: We will investigate the illegal repair, sales, or disposal of cars and vehicle parts.
keywords: Environment,Licensed business storing client vehicles/parts on street: Commercial Auto Body Shop

description: File a complaint about the work being done on a City road or sidewalk.
keywords: PATCH, CUT, MESSY, NO PARKING, BLOCKING, CONSTRUCTION, CONTRACTOR, UTILITY, WORK IN THE ROAD/SIDEWALK, ETC. PLATES , POSTINGS, LEAFLETS, SUNKEN,  SETTLED,  DUST

service_name: Gas or electricity utility charge is wrong
description: File a report if you think you were charged for unused gas or electricity.
keywords: Utilities, Housing,Cross Metering, metering

service_name: Dead animal on street or sidewalk
description: You can request to have a dead animal (roadkill) removed from public roadways or sidewalks. WE DO NOT remove deceased household pets, please contact your veterinarian.
keywords: Pick Up Dead Animal Public Way, Dead Animal on Public Street

description: Get help from a disability advocate through the City.
keywords: Disability, General, Request, Comment, Other, Human Services

description: File a report if a dumpster dropoff or pickup is very noisy.

description: Schedule an inspection for permitted electrical work. Only licensed electricians can make this request.

description: Request that we empty a public trash barrel.
keywords: Empty Litter Basket, Overflowing trash can

description: Equipment includes basketball backboards and rims, tennis nets, fences, and bleachers. We can paint, power wash, and fix many issues.
keywords: Equipment Repair, broken park equipment

service_name: Fire hydrant is open or broken
description: Fix a hydrant that has been opened or knocked down.
keywords: BWSC, Fire Hydrant, Flooding, Graffiti, Repair, Boston Water and Sewer

description: Report a fire in a place that serves food. If the fire is at a wholesale establishment, please file a report with the State Food and Drug Administration.

service_categories.description: Health and Safety BOS311, including needle removal

service_name: Gas sold at wrong price by gas station
description: A gas station is selling gas at the wrong price.
keywords: Gas pump meters not accurate

description: You can report a general issue with a building. Examples include abandoned buildings, illegal rooming houses, work taking place without a permit, and more.
keywords: Building ,Building Complaint

service_name: General comments for a city worker, program, or policy

keywords: Complaint, Compliment, Employee, Program, Policy,General comments

description: We can help with issues including redirecting the beam of a streetlight, or even removing sneakers on a wire.
keywords: General Lighting; Lighting; Street Light(s); Lights; etc.

description: Can't find the right category? Make your request here.
keywords: Generic Request, General Request, Other, Miscellaneous

description: We'll remove graffiti from public and private property.
keywords: Graffiti Illegal Graffiti

description: You can request that we clean up a park, cut grass and whack weeds, or fix other issues. This includes removing dead animals or abandoned items.
keywords: Ground Maintenance, Park trash barrel overflowing

service_name: Heat too high or too low
description: The temperature in your apartment needs to reach 68 degrees from 7 a.m. - 11 p.m., and 64 degrees from 11:01 p.m. - 6:59 a.m. The temperature is considered "too much" if it's greater than 78 degrees. Please note: we don't process "not enough" heat complaints from June 15 - September 15.
keywords: Housing, Excessive heat; Insufficient heat

description: Get an accessible parking sign removed.
keywords: HP Sign, Handicap Parking,HP Sign Removal

description: Report the illegal posting of signs on public property.

description: File a report on someone selling goods on public property without a permit.
keywords: Sale of goods without visible permit, Illegal Vending

description: File a report if someone places trash out too early, or after collection. You can also file a report if someone places trash in the wrong container, or leaves empty barrels on the sidewalk.

description: Report that lead paint may be present in your apartment. You can file a report if the building was built before 1978 and there is a child 6-years-old or younger living there.

description: Request that we repair a public trash barrel.
keywords: Litter Basket Maintenance; Repair Litter Basket

description: If there are five or more streetlights out in a row on a street, you can file a report.

description: We don't run the public transit system, but we will reach out to them on your behalf.

description: You can file a general complaint related to snow.

description: Report that you, or someone with you, was bitten by a rat.

service_name: Rental unit has issues at move-in
description: Report that an apartment you just moved into is unsafe or unsanitary. Please file your report within 24 hours of moving into your apartment.

description: We will review requests for standard trash & recycling barrel installation.

description: We plow snow on public roads in the City.
